languages.text: "Никак не могу привыкнуть видеть такую юную девушку в роли боевого соратника..."
"I feel my age when fighting alongside such young warriors..."
languages.original_text: "Никак не могу привыкнуть видеть такую юную девушку в роли боевого соратника..."

traits.locale_text: "I will never grow accustomed to seeing such a young woman as a comrade in arms..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will never grow accustomed to seeing such a young woman as a comrade in arms..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will never grow accustomed to seeing such a young woman as a comrade in arms..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will never grow accustomed to seeing such a young woman as a comrade in arms..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “要和这么年轻的战士们并肩作战，我感觉我确实是上了年纪……”
languages.original_text: "I feel my age when fighting alongside such young warriors..."

traits.locale_text: “要和这么年轻的战士们并肩作战，我感觉我确实是上了年纪……”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Luchando junto a gente tan joven, noto el paso de los años...».
languages.original_text: "I feel my age when fighting alongside such young warriors..."

traits.locale_text: «Luchando junto a gente tan joven, noto el paso de los años...».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「このような若い戦士と共に戦うと、己の老いを感じるものだ…」
languages.original_text: "I feel my age when fighting alongside such young warriors..."

traits.locale_text: 「このような若い戦士と共に戦うと、己の老いを感じるものだ…」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich spüre mein Alter, wenn ich an der Seite so junger Krieger kämpfe ..."
languages.original_text: "I feel my age when fighting alongside such young warriors..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde mich nie daran gewöhnen, eine so junge Frau als Waffenschwester zu haben ..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Me battre aux côtés de guerriers aussi jeunes me rappelle à mon grand âge... »
languages.original_text: "I feel my age when fighting alongside such young warriors..."

traits.locale_text: « Me battre aux côtés de guerriers aussi jeunes me rappelle à mon grand âge... »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I feel my age when fighting alongside such young warriors..."

languages.text: "Gençlerle omuz omuza çarpışırken yaşımı daha bir hissediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I feel my age when fighting alongside such young warriors..."

traits.locale_text: "Gençlerle omuz omuza çarpışırken yaşımı daha bir hissediyorum."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
